title: Calorimetry experiment to determine heat capacity

content.description:
A calorimetry experiment is conducted to determine the specific heat capacity of a metal. The results are shown in the following table.

Initial temperature of metal

Mass of water

Initial temperature of water

Final temperature of water

Specific heat capacity of water
